//Title of this code
//g++  4.9.2

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define NO_CHARS 256
int main()
{
    
    int t;
    int i;
    char ch;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int arr[NO_CHARS] = {0};
        int count = 0;
        char temp;
        char str[100000];
        scanf("%s",str);
        for(i = 0;i<strlen(str);i++)
            arr[str[i]]++;
    
        for(i = 0;i<123;i++)
        {
            if(arr[i] != 0)
                count++;
        }
        
        if(count%2 == 0)
            cout<<"Terrorist"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"Counter Terrorist"<<endl;
        
    }
}
